title: Remove Play Store Guide section from KYL UI

requirements.summary: Remove all UI entry points and rendering for the Play Store Guide so users cannot navigate to or view the Play Store publishing checklist.
acceptanceCriteria: The sidebar/mobile navigation no longer shows an item labeled "Play Store Guide".
The Overview page no longer shows a "Play Store Guide" quick-link card.
The app no longer defines or navigates to a "play-store-guide" section id (no route/switch case that renders the Play Store guide).
The project builds successfully with no TypeScript errors after removing the section and its references.

file_operations.description: Remove the navigation entry with id "play-store-guide" / label "Play Store Guide" from navigationSections so it no longer appears in sidebar or mobile navigation.
Remove the "Play Store Guide" quick-link card (and its onNavigate('play-store-guide') call) from the Overview quick links grid.

Remove the Play Store guide section from app navigation/rendering: drop PlayStoreChecklistSection import, remove 'play-store-guide' from SectionId, and remove the switch case that renders the Play Store checklist.
Delete the Play Store publishing checklist UI section to ensure the content is no longer present in the codebase or renderable.
